function:
def priority(item: float, bins: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    """Returns priority with which we want to add item to each bin.

    Args:
        item: Size of item to be added to the bin.
        bins: Array of capacities for each bin.

    Return:
        Array of same size as bins with priority score of each bin.
    """
    """Improved version of `priority_v1`."""
    num_bins = len(bins)
    priorities = np.zeros(num_bins)
    for i in range(num_bins):
        if bins[i] >= item:
            priorities[i] = 1
        else:
            remaining_capacity = bins[i] - item
            remaining_items = bins[i+1:]
            for j in range(len(remaining_items)):
                if remaining_items[j] <= remaining_capacity:
                    priorities[i] += 1
                    remaining_capacity -= remaining_items[j]
                else:
                    priorities[i] += remaining_capacity / bins[i]
                    break
    return priorities
